name: Black Magic, White Cat
description:
Playtime: ~30 min - 1 hr

Made in a weekend for Ludum Dare game jam #48. Theme: Deeper & Deeper.

NOTES: 

  • If playing on Chrome, third-party cookies are disabled by default. This means saving may not work properly (and you'll see warning messages).
    • Workarounds:
      • Play on a different browser
      • Enable third-party cookies on Chrome (directions)
      • Use the save/load feature from the top-left menu icon. You'll still see  warning messages occasionally
  • The disabled path "Follow the Cat" hasn't been fully released yet. Soon!!

Writing & Programming: Lily

Art: Colm
